sources.title: Cross-Examination (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: H.B. Warner, Sally Blane, Natalie Moorhead
Director: Richard Thorpe

When witness after witness piles up damaging evidence against a boy charged with the murder of his father, can his defense Attorney uncover the identity of the real killer and the accused youth's life?

sources.title: Cross-Examination (1932) Drama, Mystery Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Is a Woman's Past Her Own Secret? 
Defense Atorney Gerald Waring uses great skill and ingenuity in his efforts to save the life of a boy charged with the murder of his father. Witness after witness piles up damaging evidence against the accused youth, but expert cross-examination by Waring digs out the startling truth.

Director: Richard Thorpe
Writers: Arthur Hoerl, Arthur Hoerl 
Stars: H.B. Warner, Sally Blane, Natalie Moorhead
Genres: Classics, Drama, Mystery

metadata.Plot: Defense Atorney Gerald Waring uses great skill and ingenuity in his efforts to save the life of a boy charged with the murder of his father. Witness after witness piles up damaging evidence against the accused youth, but expert cross-examination by Waring digs out the startling truth behind the killing and subsequently reveals the identity of the real killer in a surprise-twist ending.
metadata.Actors: H.B. Warner, Sally Blane, Natalie Moorhead
